World_Map_Colors.AllowValues: Default_Stardew_Valley, Earthy_Recolour, Vibrant_Pastoral_Red, Vibrant_Pastoral_Green, Wittily_Named_Dark, Wittily_Named_Light
World_Map_Colors.Description: Change the color of the farm area on the world map to fit the recolor you're using. May not work alongside SVE if the recolor mod itself doesn't support SVE.

Use_Northern_Path.Description: Add a new map between the farm's northern exit and the Backwoods.

Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFF.Description: Either set the abandoned shed location on the medium map or disable it entirely.

Abandoned_Shed_Location_WaFFLE.Description: Either set the abandoned shed location on the large map or disable it entirely.

Abandoned_Shed_Appearance.Description: Either let the game decide or manually select the appearance of the shed to fit different textures packs.

Shed_Wood_Color.Description: Select the color of the floor planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars.

Shed_Wood_Type.Description: Select the texture of the floor planks adjacent to the shed's walls and pillars.

Remove_Shed_Pillars.Description: Increase visibility and available space inside the abandoned shed by removing the support pillars.

Roof_Greenhouse_Type.Description: Set the roof greenhouse to accommodate either 8 iridium sprinklers and 20 trees, 12 sprinklers and 4 trees, or 2 sprinklers and 40 trees.

Use_Waterfall_Cave.Description: Allow the Waterfall cave to no longer act as an extra location but replace the farm's cave instead. As long as that option is NOT used, the farm's cave will be left untouched (allowing for the use of a different mod's cave if desired). WARNING! Empty your cave before activating that option as cave's content is not transferred automatically!

Smaller_Shortcut_Caves.Description: Make the shortcuts' entrances smaller. Regular horses will no longer be able to use them.

Secret_Woods_Shortcut.Description: Unlock a path next to the farm's shrine that will quickly lead to the Secret Woods if the player has already been there at least once.

Pethouse_Type_WaFF.Description: Either remove the doghouse or change its appearance to fit different textures styles.

Use_Animal_Pen_WaFF.Description: When playing on the medium map, place one or more animal pens on the western side of the farm.

Pethouse_Type_WaFFLE.Description: Either remove the doghouse or change its appearance to fit different textures styles.

Use_Animal_Pen_WaFFLE.Description: When playing on the larger map, place one or more animal pens on the western side of the farm.

Use_Invisible_Barriers.Description: Prevent animals from using stairs, bridges or leaving the pen. Disable to let them roam the farm freely.

Beach_Type_WaFF.Description: When playing on the medium map, choose between a dry beach full of sand with very few water, a grassy beach with a large lake or a saltwater one with sea forage and palm trees.

Fish_Pool_WaFF.Description: When playing on the medium map, select the type of fishes that can be caught on the farm (this feature will change after Stardew Valley 1.6 update). Sea fishes can only be caught if the sea beach is active.

Beach_Type_WaFFLE.Description: When playing on the large map, choose between a dry beach full of sand with very few water, a grassy beach with a large lake or a saltwater one with sea forage and palm trees.

Fish_Pool_WaFFLE.Description: When playing on the large map, select the type of fishes that can be caught on the farm (this feature will change after Stardew Valley 1.6 update). Sea fishes can only be caught if the sea beach is active.

Marine_Crab_Pots.Description: Allow Crab Pots to catch sea fishes instead of freshwater ones. Will only work if the sea beach is active.

Turn_Pond_into_Spa.Description: Turn the small pond south of the twin waterfalls into a healing pond.

No_Water_Spa.Description: Remove water effects and properties from the healing pond (usefull for some mod compatibility issues, note that this is automatically actived when using the Swim mod).

TF_Dirt_Color.Description: Select the color of the dirt around the twin waterfalls area. The automatic option will leave the dirt dark and only change it in case of compatibility issues (like mods trying to use said dirt as quarry tiles).

Use_Small_Ridges.Description: Add two small ridges south of the farmhouse and near the south-eastern bridge.

Less_Cliffs.Description: Remove some cliffs from the farm to create a larger flat areas.

Fountain_Decoration.Description: Add fountains and their decorated surroundings to the selected farms.

Use_Wooden_Bridges.Description: Revert the eastern stone bridges on WaFFLE to their previous wooden form.

Less_Fences.Description: Remove non essential fences. Will behave differently if combined with the Less Foliage option.

Dense_Forest_Area.Description: Add trees and a dense foliage above the tree stumps West of both farms and East of WaFFLE.

Unlock_Shed.Description: Unlock and fully upgrade the abandoned shed, no matter the advancement of your farmhouse (casks still need the cellar in order to work). Useful if any issue prevents the upgrades from unlocking the normal way.

Cellar_Allows_Casks_in_Cave.Description: Once the farmhouse cellar is built, also extend the usage of casks to the Waterfall Cave and the entry floor of the abandoned shed.

Add_Dark_Shrine.Description: Generate a statue next to Grandpa's shrine that'll behave as a Dark Shrine. Useful to correct older versions of the farm where monsters spawning was incorrectly activated.

Entries.ATK_WaFF_Description: Waterfall Forest_A medium size map, offering you the boons of a forest and circled by waterfalls!

Entries.ATK_WaFFLE_Description: Waterfall Forest LE_A large size map, offering you the boons of a forest and circled by waterfalls!
